Title: Farewell My Concubine
Writer: Pik Wah Lee (novel), Pik Wah Lee (screenplay), Wei Lu
Actors: Leslie Cheung, Fengyi Zhang, Li Gong, You Ge
Plot: "Farewell, My Concubine" is a movie with two parallel, intertwined stories. It is the story of two performers in the Beijing Opera, stage brothers, and the woman who comes between them. At the same time, it attempts to do no less than squeeze the entire political history of China in the twentieth century into a three-hour time-frame.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 8 nominations.
